summary: A Flax neural network module that encapsulates a DistilBERT transformer model tailored for sequence classification, managing parameter initialization and executing the forward computation to produce class logits from tokenized text inputs.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use component for building, training, and deploying text classification solutions—such as sentiment analysis or topic categorization—within JAX/Flax pipelines, leveraging the efficiency of DistilBERT.
